description: GitHub Copilot is an AI-powered code autocompletion tool that uses OpenAI's GPT technology to suggest code snippets and completions based on natural language input.

input_output_examples.input: Create a function that takes a string and returns the string reversed.
Calculate the sum of all the numbers in an array.

1.description: Copilot uses context to suggest code that is likely to be relevant and useful to the user.

2.description: Copilot suggests complete code snippets, including function definitions and variable declarations.

3.description: Copilot can suggest code in multiple programming languages, making it useful for a wide range of projects.

use_cases.name: Code autocompletion
use_cases.description: Copilot can be used to speed up the process of writing code, by suggesting relevant code snippets and completions as the user types.

use_cases.name: Learning and education
use_cases.description: Copilot can be used as a tool for learning and education, by providing suggestions and explanations of how code works.

use_cases.name: Code review and debugging
use_cases.description: Copilot can be used to review and debug code, by suggesting alternative implementations and catching errors.

accuracy.description: Copilot's accuracy depends on the quality of the training data and the context in which it is used.
